essays.title: On Tranquility in the Digital Age
essays.excerpt: How do we find our spiritual corner in this era? Minimalism in digital life.
essays.content:
A reflection on digital minimalism. Perhaps the answer lies in conscious disconnecting. Turn off notifications, put down the phone.

Minimalism in digital life is not abandoning technology, but using it more mindfully.

essays.title: Zen and the Art of Motorcycle Maintenance
essays.excerpt: A masterpiece on philosophy and craft. Reflecting on Quality.
essays.content: Robert Pirsig's book is a philosophical inquiry into Quality. It exists beyond subjective and objective. Recommended for anyone seeking balance.
